name: EventStreamConfig
author: Andrew Otto
descriptionmsg: Exposes event stream config in an API endpoint.  Can also be used to expose configs via ResourceLoader

EventStreams.description: A list of individual stream configs.  Each stream config object must minimally specify its `schema_title` and its `stream` name settings.  The `stream` may either be a static stream name string, or a regex that matches stream names for which the stream config should be used.
